title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: Omo this election wey pass just teach some politicians say the masses really get voice if they ready to come out , even the army and police no fit hold dem. The for the past 20years now our leaders wey will elect put for office no fit give account or give us quality representation and e dey tell on our economy Badly.Bad governance done make some men wey get dreams go out hand for bad thing just for the sake of make dem chop , and e no really make sense at this point we need quality leaders not dealers , make the life of an average Nigerian for better.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: I fit point 15 threads for the first page of this board way your post for fit enter as comment but you decide to make an topic. I don tire cause this election talk don too much. I hope say when governorship election pass, these threads go end because this board don dey turn whatsapp status. Make we talk about bitcoin or problems way people dey face for crypto industry.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: My dear princess no be wetin we go talk too much because I know say this election matter full all our thread for this forum so we need to give less attention because I believe say very soon him name fit enter for shitposter. I no too blame our brother agbe wey list people names for shitposting.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on March 12, 2023, 06:48:57 PMI hope say when governorship election pass, these threads go end because this board don dey turn whatsapp status. Make we talk about bitcoin or problems way people dey face for crypto industry. Hahahahahaha, omo this madam, funny die. E say the board don dey turn WhatsApp status. But, na true shah, the rate and frequency way these thread just carry dey bump up eh, e reach watin person go dey cry out and with time, I know say people go learn to behave. Like the drastic measure way Agbe take days ago, na to tell people say, e no sweet for eye at all.Our nation na country way matter too full, I agree. But, most of this matter get threads way them fit go in.  I feel say, one thing way dey contribute to these multiple threads na improper organisation of the original or first thread. Make una try dey use time come up with better idea and broaden the scope of your thread to ensure proper discussion. No con dey carry anxiety dey create thread in just few minutes. E no reflect well on most of una way dey do this thing. Slow down and follow the forum, na the way!

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: This election teach me many things o. Na this election make me know say Nigerian youth get one mouth and one voice, our problem na bad leaders wey we get full everywhere. Our vote no really count even when e dey obvious. If only our leaders go do the right thing by providing job opportunities, wahala no go dey this country. If every graduate get work, crime rate go reduce, everybody go compot him self. But as work no dey, hustle no dey pay, things cost, everybody go dey reason illegal illegal.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on March 12, 2023, 06:48:57 PMI fit point 15 threads for the first page of this board way your post for fit enter as comment but you decide to make an topic. I don tire cause this election talk don too much. I hope say when governorship election pass, these threads go end because this board don dey turn whatsapp status. Make we talk about bitcoin or problems way people dey face for crypto industry. My dear madam, e too much. I remember those days, for you to be able to create one topic, you go done reason am well, check your grammar and already get target, do research. Then go sit down, and merits go dey come and person go grow fast.But these days na really WhatsApp status be topic now. But we no get option tha. To calm down as Smartvirus talk, make the election for pass finish.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: This election matter don turn to national anthem for this our local board. Make this election do come go make we change anthem. Wether this our new members dem dey read at all  na wetin I never know yet. Abeg anybody wey dey bring Dem onboard for dey try educate dem small make we know say dem no go fall victim of ban or shitposting just as our Comrade Agbe don talk before. New bies make una dey read forum policy well before una dey post. This post with election tagging don too much here this board don too dey spammed with election matter. Stop creating multiple thread with election heading! If you have anything election to post do well to post that on the recommended election thread!

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on March 12, 2023, 06:48:57 PMI fit point 15 threads for the first page of this board way your post for fit enter as comment but you decide to make an topic. I don tire cause this election talk don too much. I hope say when governorship election pass, these threads go end because this board don dey turn whatsapp status. Make we talk about bitcoin or problems way people dey face for crypto industry. Na true oo, make i just say the beginning of this year, about of election dey among waiting we dey discuss for here, he suppose make we drag the Mata come back small, make we reduce the noise about it, we should try to bring another things like talking about bitcoin and some things, that fit make our discussion better for here, because even if we talk about the election from now till tomorrow, na waiting our leaders wish they will do, he better make we find something wey go encourage us pass election own.
